title: Need font identified for a T-Shirt I am designing! Please help!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016013529im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Fonthelp_5161.jpg)
 I need to figure out what font this is for a T-Shirt I am making for my friend. Can someone please help me deduce what font this is?
author: btelvington

comments.content: I just realized I posted to the wrong place. Sorry!
